amount.description: The amount of the transfer reversal, in cents.

balance_transaction.description: The balance transaction associated with this transfer reversal.

created.description: Timestamp representing when the transfer reversal was created.

currency.description: The currency of the transfer reversal amount.

destination_payment_refund.description: The ID of the payment refund to which this transfer reversal is linked.

id.description: Unique identifier for the transfer reversal.

metadata.description: A set of key-value pairs that you can attach to the transfer reversal.

object.description: Indicates the object type, which should be 'transfer_reversal'.

source_refund.description: The ID of the refund on the source transfer that created this reversal.

transfer.description: The ID of the transfer for which this is a reversal.
